string.name: title
string.font: S O S \n \n A new way to play tic-tac-toe!

resources.string: This game\'s just like \n tic-tac-toe, with a dash of complexity.
Either player can place \n S or O on the board
String them to make matches; make S-O-S chains!
You can match \n horizontally, vertically, \n or diagonally in straight lines!
Get a match?\n Make another move!\n Rack up those points!
Don\'t match on your turn? Your foe can use it himself!
That\'s all we\'ve got! \n Enjoy the game! ^_^
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
